text: Beleli railway station (, Balochi:بیلیلی ریلوے اسٹیشن) is located in Beleli town, Quetta district of Balochistan province of the Pakistan. ==See also== * List of railway stations in Pakistan * Pakistan Railways ==References== ==External links== *Official Web Site of Pakistan Railways Category:Railway stations in Quetta District Category:Railway stations on Rohri–Chaman Railway Line
title: Beleli railway station
